tasks.title: Environment Setup and Pre-Migration Backup
tasks.description: Initialize the distribution and archive directories and perform a full backup of all source materials to prevent data loss.
tasks.details:
1. Create directory `dist/` for final outputs.
2. Create directory `dist/images/` and `dist/images/ko/` for assets.
3. Create directory `archive/`.
4. Copy `docs/`, `legacy/`, `staging/`, `templates/`, and root Markdown files (`University_Copilot_Guide_for_Beginners.md`, `University_Copilot_Guide_Admin.md`) into `archive/` preserving the structure.
5. Verify file counts and sizes match between source and archive.
tasks.testStrategy: Run a script to compare checksums (MD5/SHA) of files in source directories vs. `archive/` to ensure exact duplication.

subtasks.title: Initialize Distribution Directory Structure
subtasks.description: Create the output directory hierarchy for the final build artifacts.
subtasks.details: Create the `dist/` root directory. Inside it, create `dist/images/` and `dist/images/ko/` to house English and Korean image assets respectively, ensuring the target environment is ready for content generation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify directories exist using `ls -d dist/images/ko`.

subtasks.title: Initialize Archive Directory
subtasks.description: Create the dedicated archive folder to store the pre-migration backup.
subtasks.details: Create the `archive/` directory at the project root. This will serve as the destination for the raw copy of all source materials before any consolidation scripts are run.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify `archive/` directory exists.

subtasks.title: Backup Source Directories
subtasks.description: recursively copy all source content folders into the archive directory.
subtasks.details: Copy the directories `docs/`, `legacy/`, `staging/`, and `templates/` into `archive/`. Ensure that file metadata and directory structures are preserved recursively (e.g., using `cp -r` or similar).
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that `archive/docs`, `archive/legacy`, etc. exist and contain files.

subtasks.title: Backup Root Documentation Files
subtasks.description: Copy essential root-level Markdown documentation files to the archive.
subtasks.details: Copy `University_Copilot_Guide_for_Beginners.md` and `University_Copilot_Guide_Admin.md` from the project root into `archive/`. These are critical source inputs for the consolidation process.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify the specific markdown files exist inside the `archive/` folder.

subtasks.title: Verify Backup Integrity
subtasks.description: Validate that the archived files match the source files in count and size.
subtasks.details: Run a verification step (e.g., using `diff -r` or comparing file counts/checksums) to ensure that the contents of `archive/` are identical to the source locations (`docs/`, `legacy/`, etc.). Report any discrepancies.
subtasks.testStrategy: Execute a checksum comparison script or command line diff; expect zero output or specific success message.

tasks.title: Content Inventory and Source Mapping
tasks.description: Analyze all source files to map specific sections to the final document structure defined in the PRD.
tasks.details:
1. Scan `docs/en/` and `docs/ko/` for Level 1-3 content.
2. Scan `staging/refined_content.md` for updates to Level 1-3 content.
3. Scan `legacy/` for unique Admin workflows not present in `docs/`.
4. Scan `templates/exercises/` for workbook content.
5. Create a JSON or Markdown map file (`content_map.json`) defining the source path for each section of the final `University_Copilot_Guide_Complete_*.md` structure (Introduction, Basics, Practical, Advanced, Admin, Appendix).
tasks.testStrategy: Manual review of `content_map.json` against PRD Section 3.2 to ensure every target section has a defined source.

subtasks.description: Analyze the primary documentation directories to establish the base content structure against the PRD sections.

subtasks.testStrategy: Create a preliminary list of files and verify that they cover PRD Sections 1 through 3 without gaps.
